Posts.Content: my husband has been having blood tests, he has been to see a specialist, but is unable to have an internal examination as he has a colostomy his last blood test reading this time was9.2 it has been slowly increasing over the last year, his first reading was around 5 - 6 but is now 9.2, we are worried , our doctor has just said come back in a few weeks time for another blood test can you recommend any suggestions
Posts.Title: colostomy & prostate cancer
